name: shirt
content:

A1 a piece of clothing worn, especially by men, on the upper part of the body, made of light cloth like cotton and usually having a collar and buttons at the front: a striped/white shirt a short-/long-sleeved shirt You've spilled something down your shirt front. See also
nightshirt
sweatshirt
